channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Steam Deck : est-ce le bon moment d’acheter avant une possible hausse des prix ?
item.description: Si vous aviez dans l'idée d'acheter un Steam Deck, maintenant semble le meilleur moment pour se faire plaisir. Qui sait si la console portable sera disponible encore longtemps aux prix actuels : les stocks sont vides en Amérique du Nord, et rien ne dit que Valve regarnisse les linéaires bientôt — et si c'est le cas, le danger est qu'une hausse de tarifs vienne compromettre l'excellent rapport qualité/prix de l'appareil....

item.title: One More ‘Stranger Things’ Actor Wants You to Give Up on ‘Conformity Gate’
item.description: Caleb McLaughlin shares his thoughts on how fans reacted to the ending of 'Stranger Things.'

item.title: Crypto-Funded Human Trafficking Is Exploding
item.description: The use of cryptocurrency in sales of human beings for prostitution and scam compounds nearly doubled in 2025, according to a conservative estimate. Many of the deals are happening in plain sight.

item.title: This $7,999 robot will fold (some of) your laundry
item.description: If you have a spare $7,999 (plus a $250 deposit), hate folding laundry, and happen to live in the Bay Area, one-and-a-half-year-old startup Weave has the robot for you: Isaac 0. It takes Isaac 0 around 30-90 minutes to fold a load of laundry, Weave says. That's all it does - it's stationary and needs […]

item.title: C’est historique : AMD signe sa meilleure année sur le marché des processeurs
item.description: AMD affiche une excellente santé financière en 2025 et atteint des parts de marché encore jamais vues depuis l'arrivée de l'architecture Ryzen.

item.title: ‘The ideal runner’s headphones’: our top-rated Shokz fitness headphones are one of the best Presidents’ Day deals out there — plus 4 more unmissable headphones deals
item.description: Presidents' Day is the perfect time to score new fitness headphones to really kick-start your 2026 fitness journey.

item.title: La Russie bloque WhatsApp et restreint Telegram
item.description: La Russie a confirmé jeudi le blocage de l’application de communication WhatsApp, qui fait suite à des restrictions annoncées en début de semaine sur Telegram, sa rivale en popularité, pour non-respect de la législation.

item.title: ‘Being in the middle of these disputes is crazy’: A24’s first unscripted TV show heads to HBO Max this weekend — and you won’t believe your eyes
item.description: New HBO Max show Neighbors looks like the most unhinged TV series of 2026 – but producers claim there’s ‘no conflict for conflict’s sake’.

item.title: I found the best way to save big in the Dell Presidents' Day sale with this Dell Tower desktop and 24in monitor deal
item.description: Save over $500 on this Dell Tower desktop and 24in monitor bundle in the Dell Presidents' Day sale

item.title: 13 Best MagSafe Power Banks for iPhones (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your iPhone or Qi2 Android phone topped up with one of these WIRED-tested Qi2 or MagSafe portable chargers.

item.title: Microsoft patches concerning Windows 11 Notepad security flaw - Markdown issues could have let hackers slip in malware without warning
item.description: Microsoft Patch Tuesday addresses high-severity flaw in Windows 11 Notepad that enabled remote code execution attacks.

item.title: A surprise Diablo 2: Resurrected DLC adds Warlock, the first new class the game has had in 25 years, with Diablo 4 and Diablo Immortal also expected to receive it this year
item.description: Blizzard Entertainment has added the Warlock class to Diablo 2: Resurrected, and confirmed that the same class will be coming to Diablo 4 and Diablo Immortal this year.

item.title: Amazon brade à -21 % cette serrure connectée qui renforce la sécurité de votre domicile sans vous ruiner
item.description: La serrure connectée EZVIZ DL01 Pro renforce la sécurité de votre domicile avec une conception robuste et intuitive. En promotion à 109 € au lieu de 139 € sur Amazon, elle s’installe facilement et vous assure la tranquillité.

item.title: Valve's Steam Deck OLED is out of stock in the US, and I think we can guess why
item.description: Valve's Steam Deck OLED models are out of stock in the US, and the RAM crisis looks like it may be responsible again.

item.title: Before The Witcher there was Gothic — and now we know exactly when this legendary RPG is coming back in a new remake
item.description: The upcoming Gothic remake finally has a release date.

item.title: Krach du Bitcoin : cette plateforme crypto bloque les retraits à cause des « conditions de marché »
item.description: Alors que le marché crypto s'affiche dans le rouge, une plateforme d'échange américaine, très prisée des gros investisseurs, a été obligée de geler les dépôts et les retraits de leurs clients. Cette décision ravive le spectre du krach de fin 2022, qui a traumatisé tous les investisseurs.

item.title: Sorry, Marvel's Wolverine probably isn't showing at today's State of Play according to Insomniac itself
item.description: Insomniac says 'Spring 2026' for more Marvel's Wolverine info, so you probably shouldn't expect it at today's State of Play.

item.title: UK Ad Group Chides Disney for ‘Predator: Badlands’ Ad With Severed Robo-Body
item.description: Elle Fanning's half-body character, Thia, caused a minor stir, forcing Disney to censor its marketing.

item.title: Therabody JetBoots Pro Plus Review: 3-in-1 Recovery Tech
item.description: The JetBoots Pro Plus promise faster, more effective recovery by combining multiple therapies in one device. I tested whether it’s worth the $1,150 splurge.

item.title: HP ZBook Ultra G1a review: a business-class workstation that’s got game
item.description: Business laptops are typically dull computers foisted on employees en masse. But higher-end enterprise workstation notebooks sometimes get an interesting enough blend of power and features to appeal to enthusiasts. HP's ZBook Ultra G1a is a nice example. It's easy to see it as another gray boring-book for spendy business types, until you notice a […]...

item.title: Xerox C325 laser printer review: I have never found it so easy to copy documents
item.description: Swift duplex printing and scanning make this the ideal copier.

item.title: I'm a coffee lover and I'm tempted by this Ninja coffee machine that does it all — now down to its lowest-ever price
item.description: At this record-low price, I might just add this discounted 4.5-star Ninja Luxe Café machine to my collection of coffee makers.

item.title: Ce soir, Ariane 6 donne toute sa puissance : pourquoi ce lancement à 4 boosters est crucial
item.description: Pour son premier des huit lancements prévus en 2026, Arianespace s’apprête à faire décoller aujourd'hui la version à quatre boosters d’Ariane 6 dont ce sera le vol inaugural. Pour cette mission inédite, la version la plus puissante d’Ariane 6 lancera 32 satellites de la constellation Amazon Leo....

item.title: 'These updates raise the bar for security and privacy on Windows': Microsoft has a plan to toughen up Windows 11's defenses
item.description: Microsoft is bringing tighter security to Windows 11, including smartphone-style app permissions.

item.title: Votre Pass Navigo donne droit à du covoiturage gratuit : voilà comment faire
item.description: Lancée début février, l’application Covoit IDFM permet désormais aux abonnés Navigo de profiter de trajets de covoiturage gratuits en Île-de-France, entièrement subventionnés par la région.

item.title: All your questions about buying a Galaxy S26 answered – including preorder dates, opening deals, and carrier discounts
item.description: Thinking about upgrading to a Galaxy S26 series device? Here's everything we know so far – and some of my expert predictions, too.

item.title: KYY X90G Quad Portable Monitor Extender Review: 3 More Screens
item.description: This accessory gives your laptop three extra displays—as long as you’re prepared to lug them around.

item.title: ‘Boy kibble’ is the weird, protein-obsessed TikTok trend you can’t unsee
item.description: The gym bro answer to girl dinner has morphed into a surreal internet ritual known as ‘ground beef o’clock.’ Need some recipe inspo for dinners this week? Look no further than the latest viral food trend on TikTok: boy kibble.

item.title: 30 sexy Valentines Day gifts that will hit harder than a generic box of chocolates
item.description: Skip the teddy bears. We found the best sex toys, massage candles, and romantic spicy gifts to make Valentine's Day 2026 unforgettable.

item.title: Avoid the stress I went through hunting components during the RAM crisis — this pre-built gaming PC with 32GB of DDR5-6000MHz RAM and an RX 9070 XT is a steal
item.description: The iBuyPower Presidents' Day sale is here and it features one standout gaming PC that I'd recommend if you want to avoid the stress of finding affordable DDR5 RAM in 2026.

item.title: Ce switch HDMI KVM à -30 % vous permet de gérer deux PC avec deux écrans (et il supporte la 8K)
item.description: Le Ugreen Switch HDMI KVM permet non seulement de gérer deux PC ou consoles avec les mêmes deux moniteurs et périphériques USB, mais il supporte aussi des résolutions vidéo très élevées. Actuellement, Amazon le propose à 69,99 euros au lieu de 99,99 euros.

item.title: From curiosity to culture: Advocating for AI
item.description: AI investment alone isn’t enough, leaders must build trust, skills, and culture to unlock real value.
